cardData.title: Taj Mahal
cardData.subtitle: One of the 7 Wonders
cardData.info: The Taj Mahal ( 'Crown of the Palace') is an ivory-white marble mausoleum on the right bank of the river Yamuna in Agra, Uttar Pradesh, India.

cardData.title: Golden Temple
cardData.subtitle: A Gem to Watch
cardData.info: It is one of the holiest sites in Sikhism, alongside the Gurdwara Darbar Sahib Kartarpur in Kartarpur, and Gurdwara Janam Asthan in Nankana Sahib.

cardData.title: Shimla
cardData.subtitle: The Best Hill Station in India
cardData.info: Shimla city gets its name from Shyamala Mata, a fearless incarnation of the goddess Kali.
